title: APDCL Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Medical Officer Posts
description: The Assam Power Distribution Company Limited (APDCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Medical Officer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the APDCL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee,...
